column2: the service was excellent. My waitress was super nice; maybe she could tell I'd had a bad morning...damn train. The place was pretty empty but two of the customers around me were a pain in the a**. One old lady sent her pancakes back because she didn't like the taste (you ordered them
column4: and this you-know-what woman sitting next to me made sure to tell her waitress that the extra $0.50 charge on her bill for a side of cream cheese should be added to the menu or future customers should be forewarned. Listen
column5: I'm about as cheap as it gets
column7: worry about more important things in life.
